text: God ne Eblaham nop takaw olap aglɨl agak, Ñɨ nad nokom Aysak tɨkek, tɨkel amɨl apɨl gɨl kuŋay yenɨgabal agak. Pen kɨdek ñɨn olap, God Eblaham agɨnɨgayn tek gɨnɨgab akaŋ agɨl, nop agak, Ñɨ nad nokom yɨbɨl ak nop dam pakɨl yɨp sɨbog ñɨnɨmɨn agak. Agek, Eblaham ne God nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd nɨm, ñɨne Aysak nop dam bɨd adek ak tunɨg lɨl, God nop sɨbog ñɨnɨg gak.
